name: Awakened Zurkhwood
languages: one language known by its creator

traits.False Appearance: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal zurkhwood mushroom.
traits.Mute: If the awakened zurkhwood was created by a myconid sovereign, it can't speak.

actions.Slam: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
